alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. James, northwestern Lafourche and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 230 PM CDT... At 151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chackbay, or 9 miles north of Thibodaux, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and wind gusts of 20 to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could lead to localized flooding. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Napoleonville, Supreme, Labadieville, Paincourtville, Chackbay and Belle Rose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
